column1: #text=My wife and I were flying to New York City for a vacation .
#text=After going through the preliminaries and waiting in the lounge , we were soon stepping onto the plane and trying to find our seats .
#text=Planes can be crowded when one is getting on or off , but we found our seats and buckled in .
#text=It took a bit of time for everyone to settle in , but before long the plane was taxiing down the runway .
#text=When the plane lifted off , I could feel it tilt to one side and then right itself again .
#text=It was fun looking out of the window and seeing the world below get smaller and smaller , then disappear as we climbed above the clouds .
#text=We both enjoyed the plane ride a great deal .
#text=A flight attendant offered us drinks and snacks , and we had some orange soda and complimentary peanuts .
#text=Soon the flight was over , and it was time to disembark .
